bill.title: Integrated Public Safety Communications Fund; revise funding mechanism for.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-53-171, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Integrated Public Safety Communications Fund Shall Receive Certain Funding From The Surcharge Placed On Fines For Violations Of Certain Motor Vehicle And Traffic Regulations; To Provide That Such Funding Shall Be Used For The Maintenance And Operation Of The Statewide Wireless Communications System; To Provide That The Vendor For The Wireless Communications System Shall Use Certain Independent Companies When Seeking Services Relating To The Maintenance Of The System; To Amend Section 63-9-31, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require That The Proceeds From The Surcharge On Certain Motor Vehicle And Traffic Regulations Be Transferred To The Fund; And For Related Purposes.
